import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import './Home.css' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const Home = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const [data, setData] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const token = localStorage.getItem("jwt"); if (!token) { navigate("./signup"); } fetch("http://localhost:5000/allposts", { headers: { "Authorization": "Bearer " + localStorage.getItem("jwt") } }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(result => setData(result)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) return (
{data.map((posts) => { return (
hello
favorite

1 Like

This is amazing

mood
) })} {/*
hello
favorite

1 Like

This is amazing

mood
*/}
) } export default Home
